title.bibl: Saloniki, July 19, 1919. Thank-You Letter to Saloniki

div.bibl: Saloniki, July 19, 1919. THANK-YOU LETTER TO SALONIKI

body.p: I take pleasure in informing you that at the last meeting of the temporary Board of Directors of Koimisis Tis Theotokou Parish, your paper the Saloniki was selected as the organ of this church.

Of all the papers in the city of Chicago, yours is the only one with the courage, foresight, and moral strength to take the side of progress and improvement. Your aid will help us to attain our goal sooner and easier than would be possible without it. You have our sincerest thanks and appreciation.
